chunk-9468ec3da6121b9b6d5fade7b9b6d529.description: A chit-chat task dataset used to evaluate dialogue models, aimed at getting to know the other speaker's profile. It is also the challenge task where the Retrieve and Refine model showed superior performance in human evaluations compared to standard retrieval and generation models.

chunk-c02a07f6a200bca352b89a081c2fd544.description: Iulian V Serban is an author of the papers 'How not to evaluate your dialogue system: An empirical study of unsupervised evaluation metrics for dialogue response generation' and 'Generative deep neural networks for dialogue: A short review'.
